summary: FIRST FAILURE OF LT215/85R16 M+S LOAD RANGE E:  COMPLETE FAILURE OF TIRE; TREAD SEPARATED CAUSING DAMAGE TO UNDERSIDE AND SIDE OF RV.  HAD TRAVELED ABOUT 50 MILES.  WAS GOING 65 MPH FOR 40 MILES AND THEN 70 MPH FOR 10 MILES WHEN FAILURE OCCURED.  TRAFFIC GOING 75 MPH.  2ND FAILURE: SAW CHUNKS OF TIRE FLYING OFF AFTER ONLY 15 MILES OF TRAVEL.  FOUND CENTER OF TREAD GONE WITH OUTER PART OF TREAD LOOSE FROM REST OF TIRE.  AGAIN TRAVELING 70 MPH WITH TRAFFIC DOING 75 MPH.  *AK( DOT NUMBER: MK0P1D0V14 TIRE SIZE: LT215/85R1 )
